properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 12:12AM PST until January 9 at 3:00AM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 25 to 35 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 10 to 13 feet at 12 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Reyes to Pigeon Point 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 9 PM PST this evening. For
the Small Craft Advisory, until 3 AM PST early this morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PST THIS EVENING
